label: AB3_hP4_164_a_bd-001
title: $D0_{13}$ (AlCl$_{3}$) Structure ({\em Obsolete})
comments: This structure was suggested by (Laschkarew, 1930) and designated as {\em Strukturbericht} $D0_{13}$ by (Hermann, 1937).  However, in the next edition of {\em Strukturbericht}, (Gottfried, 1937) changed the AlCl$_{3}$ structure to the one found by (Ketellar, 1935), and designated it as \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_mC16_5_c_3c-001}{$D0_{15}$}.  Neither of these structures is currently accepted. The accepted structure is \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_mC16_12_g_ij-001}{body-centered orthorhombic, space group $C2/m \#12$}.
